title: How do I assign a unique ringtone for a contact?
answer:
Go to the contact details screen, touch **Phone ringtone**.

1.         On the **Select ringtone** screen, select a ringtone.

2.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141638684001.png).

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141639863002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141639115003.jpg) 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141640952004.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
